channel.title: Regression on STOR-i Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Regression on STOR-i Blog

item.title: Supervised or not?
item.description: MACHINE LEARNING!!! So, if you’ve not heard of machine learning yet, you probably haven’t been watching any TV the last decade. Problem is machine learning is absolutely massive field. This is the intro to a series of blog posts I plan on doing on various areas in machine learning, more specifically statistically backed methods therefore I call it statistical learning. In this blog post I aim to break down the two main areas that are generally focused on.
